title: Romania: Customers Benefit from Satisfaction Guarantee with All Consumer Banking Products from Citibank
summary: Bucharest, Romania - Customers have received one more illustration of the quality and reliability of Citibank Romania products and services with the bank's decision to offer to its customers a generous - up to six months - money-back satisfaction guarantee.
tag-1: Romania: Customers Benefit from Satisfaction Guarantee with All Consumer Banking Products from Citibank
tag-3: Bucharest, Romania – Customers have received one more illustration of the quality and reliability of Citibank Romania products and services with the bank's decision to offer to its customers a generous – up to six months – money-back satisfaction guarantee.
tag-4: The "Satisfaction Guaranteed" feature applies to all personal installment loans, credit cards and current accounts, enabling Citibank customers to evaluate their banking. If the customers are not completely satisfied with the product or services provided during this evaluation period, they can terminate the contract and receive a full refund.
tag-5: For personal installment loans, the bank will not charge the interest accumulated and the early payment fee of 1 percent in case the customer decides, within the first 30 days, that he or she no longer wants the loan, subject to the customer reimbursing the full principal of the credit.
tag-6: For all Citi Credit Cards, the bank refunds its customers the yearly administration fee in case the client decides, within the first 60 days, that the cards do not meet expectations or needs.
tag-7: Also, for Citi All-Inclusive current accounts, if the client wants to close the account in the first six months he/she will receive back the monthly fee of lei 30 paid so far.
tag-8: "With 200 years of experience in building long-term relationships with our customers, Citibank's foundation is based on bringing the products and services closer to the customers through commitment to offering a superior customer experience," says Kumar Ramachandran, Consumer Head Citibank Romania. "This is more evidence that our value proposition is built around our customer needs, and we would like to instill confidence in our clients that they will receive a financially responsible and transparent product, as well as great service every time they choose Citibank. This is a unique concept in the banking industry in Romania and yet another of the many initiatives through which we celebrate locally our global heritage, applying once again our passion for innovation to help our customers advance from ambition to achievement."
tag-9: Further information on Citibank's products and services may be found on www.citibank.ro, or by contacting the CitiPhone service line 0800801040.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
